mapper.select:
select * from ( select b.*, rownum rnum from ( select a.* from ( select q.* from qna q join sort s on s.sort_num = q.sort_num where q.member_num=1 order by q.qna_num desc ) a
) b ) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}

select * from ( select b.*, rownum rnum from ( select a.* from ( select q.*, an.answer_regdate, s.sort_name, m.member_id, m.member_name from qna q left join answer an on an.qna_num = q.qna_num left join sort s on q.sort_num = s.sort_num left join member m on m.member_num = q.member_num order by q.qna_num desc ) a
) b ) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}

select NVL(count(*),0) cnt from ( select q.*, an.answer_regdate, s.sort_name, m.member_id, m.member_name from qna q left join answer an on an.qna_num = q.qna_num left join sort s on q.sort_num = s.sort_num left join member m on m.member_num = q.member_num order by q.qna_num desc ) a
select * from qna join sort on sort.sort_num = qna.sort_num where qna.qna_num=#{qna_num}
